x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/medicationknowledge-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/MedicationKnowledge \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"MedicationKnowledge","id":"cc90be2c-df4f-41aa-adfb-acbef0aca868","contained":[{"resourceType":"Organization","id":"org4","name":"Pfizer Laboratories Div Pfizer Inc"}],"code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc","code":"0069-2587-10","display":"Vancomycin Hydrochloride (VANCOMYCIN HYDROCHLORIDE)"}]},"status":"active","manufacturer":{"reference":"#org4"},"doseForm":{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"385219001","display":"Injection Solution (qualifier value)"}]},"amount":{"value":50,"unit":"mg/ml"},"synonym":["Vancomycin Hydrochloride (VANCOMYCIN HYDROCHLORIDE)"],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:17.642+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios
